options.content:
This dashboard provides visualisations for 3 of the 4 golden signals: Errors,
Latency and Traffic.

It aims to track compliance with the following [SLOs][1]:

* 99% of requests must be served within 100ms.
* 99% of requests must result in a success response.

The following [status codes][2] are considered as error responses.

| Status Code      | ID |
| ---------------- | -- |
| Unknown          | 2  |
| DeadlineExceeded | 4  |
| Internal         | 13 |
| Unavailable      | 14 |

[1]: https://sre.google/sre-book/service-level-objectives/
[2]: https://grpc.io/docs/guides/status-codes/
